author: kameshj
msg: Fix issue #2754 - "Can't merge to target with Added children with mergeinfo".
We fix this by checking the direct-copy relationship between
subtree merge target and the corresponding source and viceversa.
If they are related we continue with 'implicit subtree merge' on a
guessed merge source url, else we set the children_sw_or_with_mergeinfo's
corresponding slot to 'NULL' and contiune with next subtree.
(elide_children, do_merge): Skip the current iteration if 'child_wcpath'
If 'merge_src_url' and 'target_wc_url' are same merge the subtress.
Else use 'guess_merge_src_child_url' to guess the merge source for the
subtree. If we have a valid guess merge the subtree, else set the
Tweak the calls to 'do_merge' and 'do_single_file_merge' based on the small
(get_repos_root): New function to get the repository root for a given
'/A_COPY/D/G/rho_copy' is not related to '/A/D/G' so merge on
parent target of '/A_COPY/D/G' from '/A/D/G' should not affect it.

author: dlr
msg: Fix davautocheck.sh to work on Mac OS X by correcting the PATH

sbin dir.  Tweak formatting of corresponding comment.
(LDD): Add new constant for 'ldd' command, set to 'otool -L' on
